videos.description: Tyler Herro lobs it up on back-to-back possessions to Precious Achiuwa.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro connects on two straight lobs to Achiuwa) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro connects on two straight lobs to Achiuwa
